values.name: Goldstone Homes Limited
values.description:
Goldstone Homes Limited provides all your building trades under one roof for Brighton & Hove as well as the surrounding areas. We offer a range of services for Homeowners, Landlords and Letting agents as well as Commercial Customers. 

We can provide a reactive same day service and also provide planned property maintenance. Some projects will require a multiple of trades but we project manage the whole process as part of the service. With this it gives you, the customer, the peace of mind that all trades work is overseen, completed on time and to a high standard.

We are able to offer fixed price tradesmen to cater for your needs in the following areas:

Handyman
Electrical
Plumbing & Heating
Kitchen & Bathrooms
Roofing & Glazing
Decorating & Tiling
Plastering & Rendering
Landscaping
Cleaning

Goldstone Homes is devoted to producing a high quality product for its end user. We are very much customer focused and look at each project individually, taking into consideration the clients requirements and needs and what you are looking for from us. We are committed to the project from inception through to completion, delivering on time and within your budget; something that so many Contractors fail to achieve. We feel confident in making this promise due to our vast experience and knowledge of the industry.

For more examples of our work just log on to www.goldstonehomes.co.uk or give us a call today on 01273 455934

Plumbing & Heating Company based in Brighton, Hove, and Horsham - We cover all aspects of plumbing & heating. Call now for a free no obligation quote - 07732 420088 or 01273 737459. The company was founded in 1997 by Arthur Huntley - The current company director. We have won awards for our customer service level and commitment to the plumbing & heating industry. We strive to make sure that we are working to the best of our abilities using the most advanced energy consumables at the current time.
values.name: Mid Sussex Plumbing & Heating Ltd

values.description:
At Parker Bathrooms we provide a personalised service designing and supplying bespoke bathrooms throughout Sussex, Surrey and London.  We are a family run business that offers an extensive selection of the world’s leading brands. Located in the elegant Seven Dials area of Brighton and Hove we have been supplying tailor-made bathrooms for over 25 years.

As expert bathroom designers we collaborate with you to create the bathroom of your dreams, paying attention to even the smallest of details. Every client and every bathroom is important to us and we guarantee our bespoke service will give you the best design experience that you could wish for. 

We invite you to browse our showroom or call us for more details - whether it’s a stylish bathroom update or a complete remodel, we pride ourselves in offering an excellent service providing quality products at a competitive cost.

Welcome to Parker Bathrooms.
values.name: Parker Bathrooms

values.description: Beautiful Ink specialise in semi permanent makeup, also known as cosmetic tattooing. Lisa creates and styles eyebrows, defines eyes and colours lips using semi permanent pigments lasting 9 - 18 months before needing a top up visit. Eyebrow design for those with missing or misshapen eyebrows a speciality, separate design only bookings available. Based in Brighton city centre and mobile in Brighton & Hove.
values.name: Beautiful Ink, semi permanent makeup
Brighton Implant Clinic
values.description: Brighton Implant Clinic is a group of three clinics based in Sussex offering affordable dental implant treatment. Our clinics are based in Hove, Brighton and Hailsham. Each of our clinics are equipped with CT scanners and onsite dental laboratory. For more information see our website www.brightonimplantclinic.co.uk

Hello, we are HOAV Studio, a multi-disciplinary design studio based in Hove.

There are two main sides to what we do; the design side and the making side. Whilst we love working on branding, print and web based projects, we are also passionate about products, objects, and large scale installations.

Wherever possible we like to see projects through the whole design process, from the initial generation of ideas to the final product or outcome.

Please feel free to get in contact to discuss any projects, products or collaborations, or if you would like anything made 20 times it's normal size.
values.name: HOAV Studio

values.description:
B-onweb is een website design- & development bedrijf gevestigd in Hove, Antwerpen.
Het is goed uitgerust eenmanszaak dat al uw Joomla B2B en B2C websites omgaat.

● Professioneel in het ontwerpen en ontwikkelen van content-rijke, full-responsive Joomla websites.
● B-onweb maakt gebruik van website strategieën en planningen en zorgt er voor dat het eindproduct voldoet aan de behoeften van de klant.
● Verschillende niveaus van kennis: Werkt met: Joomla 2.5x & 3.x, HTML, CSS, PHP / MySQL, JQuery, Google Analytics, Acrobat, Photoshop, Microsoft Office Professional Suite, XML, ActionScript, SQL, Dreamweaver en Twitters Bootstrap.
● Ontwikkelt 'full-featured' websites met sociale netwerkmogelijkheden
● Praktische kennis van diverse sociale netwerken zoals: Facebook, Linked In, Google+, Instagram en Twitter.
● Praktische kennis van verschillende e-commerce componenten, add-ons en de betaling gateways (in progress).
● Verantwoordelijk voor het onderhouden, beveiligen en bijwerken van uw website.
● Verantwoordelijk voor het installeren, verwijderen, configureren, updaten en testen van alle uitbreidingen, om zo de gaten in de beveiliging de hack-pogingen en andere bedreigingen te minimaliseren.
values.name: b-onweb
Norsk Målungdom
values.description:
Norsk Målungdom arbeider for at alle i Noreg skal ha høve og rett til å skriva nynorsk, og å fremja nynorsk, dialektbruk og språkleg mangfald på alle samfunnsområde. Me organiserer ungdom til å gå føre i dette arbeidet.

Viktige konkrete arbeidsområde er handheving av nynorskelevane sin lovfeste rett til å få læremiddel på nynorsk, oppheving av nynorskforbodet i VG og Dagbladet, aksept og respekt for alle dialektar – også dei litt uglesette dialektane på sentralsaustlandet, betre og tidlegare sidemålsopplæring, større krav til opplæring og prøving i nynorsk og bokmål i lærarutdanninga, motverka og førebyggja språkskifte frå nynorsk til bokmål, etc.

values.name: King's Church of England School
values.description:
King’s School Hove has been approved by the Department for Education, for opening in September 2013. It will be an 11-18 Church of England (CofE) secondary school. 

For more information, please visit the school website at http://www.kingsschoolhove.org.uk/.

A well established friendly accountancy firm based in Hove and Lewes, East Sussex offering a wide range of accounting, taxation and business development and support services.

They include:

Business Services
We provide a full range of services for small and medium sized businesses, including accounts preparation, taxation advice and auditing.  We can also provide bookkeeping services, completion of VAT returns, payroll assistance, preparation of year end forms such as P11Ds and provide a full company secretarial service.

Self Assessment
Our clients value our self assessment service as it ensures their Returns are filed on time and they are advised as far in advance as possible of their tax liabilities.

Tax Planning
We have staff dedicated to planning on your behalf to reduce your current and future tax liabilities. This may be achieved by fairly simple methods or might involve complex planning over several generations of a family. We take into account our clients' general financial position and offer advice on an individual basis.

Other Services
Partnership Taxation
Forensic Accounting
Computer Consultancy
Estate Administration
Trust Administration
values.name: Clark Brownscombe Chartered Accountants

Restaurants Brighton
values.description:
Restaurants Brighton is a comprehensive online eating out guide featuring Brighton and Hove restaurants and the nearby Sussex restaurants which serve Brighton. 

Including top quality and diverse restaurants - Brighton and the surrounding areas definitely takes the lead as a food destination. 

Restaurants Brighton is a food guide drawn together by people that live in Brighton, providing information for locals and tourists for Brighton and its neighbouring areas. 

Featuring top ten restaurants, brunches, reviews, chef interviews and restaurant features. 

http://restaurantsbrighton.co.uk

eat@restaurantsbrighton.co.uk

values.description:
Brunswick Court Dental Practice is a well established yet modern private dental practice conveniently located in the heart of Hove, offering high quality care in pleasant, relaxing surroundings.

Our specialities in dentistry include:

DENTAL IMPLANTS - Dental implants look and act like your own teeth. They are usually made of pure titanium and are small root shaped structures which are placed gently and carefully into the bone. 

COSMETIC DENTISTRY - This includes tooth whitening, veneers, cosmetic bonding ( used to reshape individual teeth, close very small gaps and repair slight defects such as chipped teeth ), ceramic inlays and onlays ( tooth coloured porcelain fillings, bonded into or over a broken-down tooth ).

CROWNS & BRIDGES - A crown is used to protect and restore a broken or heavily filled tooth and a bridge is used to replace a missing tooth.

PREVENTATIVE DENTISTRY - we believe in preventing problems rather than just treating them as they occur, so routine appointents every 6 months are recommended.

X-RAYS - They will show up any signs of tooth decay and bone loss.

ROOT CANAL TREATMENTS - (or endodontics) means removing damaged or dead pulp and filling the space with a special filling material.
values.name: Brunswick Court Dental Practice
Hell Yeah Mastering
values.description: We provide high quality CD mastering and vinyl pre-mastering and cutting services. Based in Brighton & Hove, we service labels and artists in the UK and EU. We are known not only for the sonic superiority of our masters but also our highly efficient service.

values.name: iSKILLu
values.description:
iSKILLu enables people to share skills knowledge and ideas, face-to-face or over the internet, without the need for money.

It enables you to teach what you know and learn what you want.

Visit the website to join in, currently only for Brighton & Hove users.
